paper_abstract: In this paper we deal with the minimum label spanning tree problem. This is a relevant problem with applications such as telecommunication networks or electric networks, where each edge is assigned with a label (such as a color) and it is intended to determine a spanning tree with the minimum number of different labels. We introduce some mixed integer formulations for this problem and prove that one of their relaxations always gives the optimal value. Finally we present and discuss the results of computational experiments. (C) 2009 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A mixed integer linear formulation for the minimum label spanning tree problem
